GenericConnectorDescriptor.description: This connector provides access to the Vonage Dispatch API. For more information, click here: https://developer.vonage.com/dispatch/overview

field.label: Override OpenAPI Spec
field.helpText: This will override the custom specification included with the connector.

field.label: Authentication Type
field.helpText: Identifies the authentication type for the connection. <boomi-help id="ATOMSPHERE:9BB88920-7DB1-45EA-B650-F9C1244C24E2">Learn more</boomi-help> about authentication.
